description: Toyota Passo Full option Auto 1000 CC car for sale in Badulla. Manufactured in 2009 December & Registered in 2011 July. Greenish Yellow colour, Remote Key, Adjustable steering wheel, "14" Alloy Wheels. CD/DVD player, Power shutters, Retractable power mirrors, Central locking, SRS duel air bags, Adjustable front & rear head rests, New tires & New Panasonic battery, Rear viper rear window demister, ABS with electronic break distribution & break assist, Very smooth electronic power steering (EPS), Tinted Glasses, Cup holders, Head light level adjuster. Original Japanese Passo carpets. All options are working properly. No pending repairs or mechanical problems. Unused spare wheel, Maintained up to date. 41000 KM genuine low mileage. One of the best cars in Toyota Passo. Lady owned & Driven car. Vehicle is in 100% showroom condition. Selling Due to upgrade. Negotiable after inspection only. If needed Leasing can be arranged.
name: Toyota Passo  2009
